column4: Hi all. I have a number of web servers in a load balanced cluster. Can anyone suggest a way of replicating users' uploaded files (images) to all servers in the cluster?
I was thinking something a bit more instantaneous. I'd have to run rsync every minute or something.
then you'd have to have shared storage at a backend
what cluster technology are you using ?

identical nginx web servers behind HAproxy load balancers
your going to have to look at shared backend storage, and something like multimaster ldap services for auth
no, as that would be a single point of failure and make the cluster pointless
if that one server goes down, all your cluster is dead
it's worthless to you unless it can be cross mounted on multiple machines as shared backend storage
